name: The Book of the Dun Cow
name_original: The Book of the Dun Cow
description:
Deep within the Earth lies a serpent. His name is Wyrm, and he seeks to destroy all that is good. Unbeknownst to the animals below, they have been put on Earth to defend their planet. Yet, through the vulnerable mind of a rooster, Wyrm begins to break his way out. Wyrm is escaping, and the animals must give their lives to defend their world. Based on the book, The Book of the Dun Cow, this itch.io game is a breathtaking 2d platformer which is now available on a pc.

Fight your way past enemies, gaining new powers and better abilities as you navigate through this role-playing metroidvania game! It is based off of the book, The Book of the Dun Cow, and follows its plot.

CONTROLS

LEFT move left

RIGHT move right

SPACE jump

UP climb/shield (if owned)

DOWN slam down (if owned)

S crow/lightning (if owned)
